DataElement.preferredName: COVID-19 Disease Response Current Medical Status
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Terminology to describe the status of the patient's current disease response due to COVID-19.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Disease Response Domain SARS Coronavirus 2 Disease Response Current Medical Status
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A domain for disease response evaluations._A positive-sense single-stranded RNA virus in the genus Betacoronavirus. It is the causative agent of the 2019-2020 severe acute respiratory syndrome outbreak.__The pathologic and/or clinical changes that result from treatment. The changes may include eradication of detectable disease, stabilization of disease, or disease progression._A question about a person's description of the patient's current medical status.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A domain for disease response evaluations.

Concepts.definition: A domain for disease response evaluations.

Property.preferredName: SARS Coronavirus 2 Disease Response Current Medical Status
Property.preferredDefinition: A positive-sense single-stranded RNA virus in the genus Betacoronavirus. It is the causative agent of the 2019-2020 severe acute respiratory syndrome outbreak.:The pathologic and/or clinical changes that result from treatment. The changes may include eradication of detectable disease, stabilization of disease, or disease progression.:A question about a person's description of the patient's current medical status.

Concepts.definition: A positive-sense single-stranded RNA virus in the genus Betacoronavirus. It is the causative agent of the 2019-2020 severe acute respiratory syndrome outbreak.
The pathologic and/or clinical changes that result from treatment. The changes may include eradication of detectable disease, stabilization of disease, or disease progression.
A question about a person's description of the patient's current medical status.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the response criteria (includes RECIST and others) and associated documentation of disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A positive-sense single-stranded RNA virus in the genus Betacoronavirus. It is the causative agent of the 2019-2020 severe acute respiratory syndrome outbreak._The pathologic and/or clinical changes that result from treatment. The changes may include eradication of detectable disease, stabilization of disease, or disease progression._A condition or state at a particular time.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication that a patient's disease is responding to treatment.

Concepts.definition: An indication that a patient's disease is responding to treatment.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Enduring or persisting; residual, left over or behind.: Subject to little fluctuation; showing little if any change.

Concepts.definition: Enduring or persisting; residual, left over or behind.
Subject to little fluctuation; showing little if any change.

PermissibleValues.value: UNKNOWN DUE TO GENERAL COVID-19 RELATED TRAVEL RESTRICTIONS
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Unknown Status Due to COVID-19-Related Travel Restrictions

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Unknown Status Due to COVID-19-Related Travel Restrictions
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that a patient's disease status is unknown due to COVID-19-related travel restrictions.

Concepts.longName: Unknown Status Due to COVID-19-Related Travel Restrictions
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that a patient's disease status is unknown due to COVID-19-related travel restrictions.

PermissibleValues.value: UNKNOWN DUE TO LACK OF DISEASE/TUMOR ASSESSMENT DUE TO COVID-19 DIAGNOSIS
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Unknown Status Due to Lack of Assessment Due to COVID-19 Diagnosis

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Unknown Status Due to Lack of Assessment Due to COVID-19 Diagnosis
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that a patient's disease status is unknown due to a lack of follow-up assessment due to a COVID-19 diagnosis.

Concepts.longName: Unknown Status Due to Lack of Assessment Due to COVID-19 Diagnosis
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that a patient's disease status is unknown due to a lack of follow-up assessment due to a COVID-19 diagnosis.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.: An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.
Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A clinical, pathologic, and/or molecular finding indicating that the course of a disease is worsening in terms of extent or severity.

Concepts.definition: A clinical, pathologic, and/or molecular finding indicating that the course of a disease is worsening in terms of extent or severity.
